blogSettingsAdmin.title: AI Blog Settings
blogSettingsAdmin.description: Configure automated blog post generation and manually create posts with AI.
blogSettingsAdmin.generationIntervalHelp: The time in hours between automatically generated blog posts (e.g., 24 for daily).
blogSettingsAdmin.topicsHelp: Comma-separated list of topics the AI will choose from for automated posts.
blogSettingsAdmin.importantNoteContent: Manual and automated blog post generation both consume AI API credits. Ensure your API key has sufficient quota. Automated generation will pause if it encounters an API error.

validation.intervalMin: Interval must be at least 1 hour.
validation.topicsRequired: At least one topic is required.

settingsSaved.title: Settings Saved
settingsSaved.description: Blog automation settings have been updated.

noTopicSelected.title: No Topic Selected
noTopicSelected.description: Please select or enter a topic to generate a blog post.

generationFailed.title: Generation Failed
generationFailed.description: Could not generate the blog post. Please try again.
